title: Singapore passes powerful foreign interference law
content:
1. Singapore passes powerful foreign interference law  The Washington Post
  2. Singapore passes law to tackle 'foreign interference,' giving authorities the power to block internet content  CNN
  3. Singapore introduces new law to prevent foreign disinformation campaigns  The Drum
  4. Fica: S'pore passes law to counter foreign interference | Key moments from Parliament: Oct 4, 2021  The Straits Times
  5. Singapore passes controversial law to counter foreign interference  BBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
